job.title: Senior Software Engineer | Payments | Banking
job.description: Senior Software Engineer - Core Payments – Leading FinTech – Tempe, Arizona Are you an Experienced Software Engineer that wants to make a meaningful impact in an organization? Are you interested in working in a banking organization that works more like a tech innovation org compared to a traditional bank? Are you looking to work in an Agile environment with a clear career progression? My Client, a leading Fintech Organization based in the San Francisco Bay Area, are looking to grow their Core Payments tech teams with both Lead and Senior full-stack software engineers with both Java and JavaScript ( ReactJS ) in Phoenix, Arizona . The ideal person should have the necessary skills and experience to provide technical guidance, estimation of efforts, understanding; and decide upon the optimal technology solution to achieve the desired business needs. You will ideally have: 5+ years of development experience as a Software Engineer Hands-on development experience in Java , J2EE, Spring Boot, etc. A deep fascination of building elegant, maintainable, well-documented, secure code – Abstracting and refactoring should be a passion, not a chore Experience with TDD and CI/CD Experience with JavaScript , React.JS , HTML, CSS, etc Experience with distributed systems and with Micro-services architecture. Experience working within a cloud environment, including Amazon Web Services (AWS) This is an excellent opportunity to work with a leading and highly respected Financial Organization, which are going through a vast and fascinating digital transformation. They have multiple office locations across the USA and can work on a Hybrid Model, although all interviews are currently fully remote. Excellent salary, bonus and benefits on offer! Send in your details ASAP to find out more and receive a full job specification
